patthana2.4:273.1_1: ceva saññojanasampayuttassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.

patthana2.4:281.1_0: Saññojano ceva saññojanasampayutto ca dhammo saññojanassa ceva saññojanasampayuttassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.4:282.1_0: Nahetuyā nava, naārammaṇe nava (sabbattha nava), noavigate nava.
